turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said a grande caramel macchiato with almond milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Cast Avenue in Dering.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said cast avenue and derian?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your order to that location, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you. Now that will be awesome.
